languages.text: {n}Под взглядом архонта Черного сердца Ирлиэт, кажется, сжимается — не то от страха, не то от отвращения.{/n} "Я... помню его. Ему я давала ответ на том суде в Комморре..." {n}Эльдарка сбивается и кривится от гнева.{/n}

{n}Yrliet almost recoils under Nazrakhei's gaze, either out of fear or disgust.{/n} "I... remember him. It was to him that I answered in that trial in Commorragh..." {n}She trails off and grimaces in anger.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Под взглядом архонта Черного сердца Ирлиэт, кажется, сжимается — не то от страха, не то от отвращения.{/n} "Я... помню его. Ему я давала ответ на том суде в Комморре..." {n}Эльдарка сбивается и кривится от гнева.{/n}

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet almost recoils under Nazrakhei's gaze, either out of fear or disgust.{/n} "I... remember him. It was to him that I answered in that trial in Commorragh..." {n}She trails off and grimaces in anger.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet schreckt unter Nazrakheis Blick fast zurück, entweder aus Angst oder aus Ekel.{/n} "Ich ... erinnere mich an ihn. Ihm musste ich bei diesem Prozess in Commorragh Antwort stehen ..." {n}Sie verstummt und verzieht vor Wut das Gesicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet almost recoils under Nazrakhei's gaze, either out of fear or disgust.{/n} "I... remember him. It was to him that I answered in that trial in Commorragh..." {n}She trails off and grimaces in anger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet schreckt unter Nazrakheis Blick fast zurück, entweder aus Angst oder aus Ekel.{/n} "Ich ... erinnere mich an ihn. Ihm musste ich bei diesem Prozess in Commorragh Antwort stehen ..." {n}Sie verstummt und verzieht vor Wut das Gesicht.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}在纳札骸的注视下，伊莉耶特几乎要退缩了，可能是出于厌恶或是恐惧。{/n}“我……我记得他。在科摩罗的那场审判中，我就是回答了他的问题……”{n}她的声音越来越低，愤怒地扭着脸。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet almost recoils under Nazrakhei's gaze, either out of fear or disgust.{/n} "I... remember him. It was to him that I answered in that trial in Commorragh..." {n}She trails off and grimaces in anger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在纳札骸的注视下，伊莉耶特几乎要退缩了，可能是出于厌恶或是恐惧。{/n}“我……我记得他。在科摩罗的那场审判中，我就是回答了他的问题……”{n}她的声音越来越低，愤怒地扭着脸。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet recule presque, de peur ou de dégoût, sous le regard de Nazrakhei.{/n} « Je... me souviens de lui. C'est lui qui m'a interrogée au procès, à Commorragh... » {n}Elle s'interrompt et grimace de colère.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet almost recoils under Nazrakhei's gaze, either out of fear or disgust.{/n} "I... remember him. It was to him that I answered in that trial in Commorragh..." {n}She trails off and grimaces in anger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet recule presque, de peur ou de dégoût, sous le regard de Nazrakhei.{/n} « Je... me souviens de lui. C'est lui qui m’a interrogée au procès, à Commorragh... » {n}Elle s'interrompt et grimace de colère.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet prácticamente recula bajo la mirada de Nazrakhei, ya sea por miedo o por asco.{/n} «Lo... recuerdo. Fue ante quien respondía en aquel juicio en Commorragh...». {n}Calla y hace una mueca de furia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet almost recoils under Nazrakhei's gaze, either out of fear or disgust.{/n} "I... remember him. It was to him that I answered in that trial in Commorragh..." {n}She trails off and grimaces in anger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet prácticamente recula bajo la mirada de Nazrakhei, ya sea por miedo o por asco.{/n} «Lo... recuerdo. Fue ante quien respondía en aquel juicio en Commorragh...». {n}Calla y hace una mueca de furia.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはナズラクヘイの視線を感じ、恐怖からかそれとも嫌悪からか、じりじりと後ずさりする。{/n}「我は…あいつを覚えている。コモラフのあの裁判で我が答えを述べた相手は…」{n}彼女は怒りに顔をしかめ、消え入りそうな声で話す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet almost recoils under Nazrakhei's gaze, either out of fear or disgust.{/n} "I... remember him. It was to him that I answered in that trial in Commorragh..." {n}She trails off and grimaces in anger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはナズラクヘイの視線を感じ、恐怖からかそれとも嫌悪からか、じりじりと後ずさりする。{/n}「我は…あいつを覚えている。コモラフのあの裁判で我が答えを述べた相手は…」{n}彼女は怒りに顔をしかめ、消え入りそうな声で話す。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, Nazrakhei'in bakışlarına olan korkusundan veya tiksintisinden ötürü neredeyse geri çekilecek gibi.{/n} "Ben... Onu hatırlıyorum. Commorragh'taki mahkemede beni sorguya çekmişti." {n}Sesi kısılıyor, öfke içinde yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet almost recoils under Nazrakhei's gaze, either out of fear or disgust.{/n} "I... remember him. It was to him that I answered in that trial in Commorragh..." {n}She trails off and grimaces in anger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, Nazrakhei'in bakışları nedeniyle duyduğu korkudan veya tiksintiden ötürü neredeyse geri çekilecek gibi.{/n} "Ben... Onu hatırlıyorum. Commorragh'taki mahkemede beni o sorguya çekmişti." {n}Sesi kısılıyor ve öfke içinde yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
